game.name: TS Marketplace: Snps Wagon Pack 01
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Snps wagon has a flatbed design in order to transport longitudinal beams, such as logs, pipework and timber. They are open flat beds with high supporting pillars which are used to tie-down loads. Almost 2000 wagons were present at their peak in the 1990s. Today, over 1100 are still in service.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Snps wagon has a flatbed design in order to transport longitudinal beams, such as logs, pipework and timber. They are open flat beds with high supporting pillars which are used to tie-down loads. Almost 2000 wagons were present at their peak in the 1990s. Today, over 1100 are still in service.
